name: Rat Station
description:
Sydney’s underground train network is frequented by thousands of passengers daily, both human… and rodent. Rat Station allows players to experience the life of a rat in some of Sydney’s most famous train stations, dodging fast trains to collect opal cards. Rat Station is a classic and addictive platform style video game. This game will be loved by Sydney Commuters, as they recognise iconic train platforms. 

Made by Mila K-C on GODOT for STEM Games Challenge
